nodes.text: During the Battle of Ithor Anakin Solo and Daeshara'cor were designated as Team Twelve. Their mission was to defend the Ithorian Herdship Tafanda Bay against the Yuuzhan Vong. Solo was floored by a reptoid soldier punching a leg wound and came under attack from a Yuuzhan Vong warrior. Daeshara'cor was able to save him, but not before being fatally wounded by an amphistaff bite.
